X-Last-Data-Change-At.description: Timestamp of last data modification (ISO 8601 UTC with millisecond precision)

X-Last-Data-Change-Rev.description: Revision counter for change detection. Compare values to detect data changes between requests.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Remaining request capacity in current window

X-Sync-In-Progress.description: If `true`, response data is valid but background sync is running — more changes may follow shortly.

from.description: Start of the queried date range, inclusive (ISO 8601 UTC timestamp)

granularity.description: Time granularity of the usage entries

to.description: End of the queried date range, exclusive (ISO 8601 UTC timestamp)

total.description: Total API requests in the period

usage.description: Per-period request totals. Periods with zero usage are omitted.

from.description: Start of period, inclusive (ISO 8601 UTC timestamp, e.g., '2025-01-07T00:00:00Z')

to.description: End of period, exclusive (ISO 8601 UTC timestamp). This is the start of the next period, so the range is [from, to). For daily granularity, 'to' is 'from' + 1 day.

total.description: Total API requests in this period

accountType.description: Account type: General (general purpose), Cash (physical cash), CurrentAccount (checking/current), CreditCard (credit card), SavingAccount (savings), Bonus (rewards), Insurance (policy), Investment (brokerage), Loan (liability), Mortgage (liability), Overdraft (facility)

initialBalance.description: Account balance before any recorded transaction activity, in the account's original currency

initialBaseBalance.description: initialBalance converted to the user's base currency, using the exchange rate at the time of account creation/update

AgentHint.description: Structured hint for AI agents to understand API responses and take appropriate actions

action.description: Action data for instruction hints. Only present when severity=instruction. Contains url for fetching next page.

data.description: Context data specific to the hint type. Structure varies based on the 'type' field. See 'text' for human-readable explanation.

severity.description: Indicates the nature/importance of the hint

x-enum-descriptions.info: Neutral informational hint (e.g., all results returned, parameter inferred)
x-enum-descriptions.instruction: Agent should take action (e.g., fetch next page via action.url)
x-enum-descriptions.warning: Alert about potential issues (e.g., rate limit approaching)

x-enum-descriptions.data.recency: Indicates when the user's data was recently modified (within 15 min). See data.lastModified for timestamp.
x-enum-descriptions.pagination.has_more: More results available beyond this page. Use action.url to fetch next page.
x-enum-descriptions.param.inferred: A query parameter was automatically inferred by the system (e.g., date range bounds).
x-enum-descriptions.rate_limit.warning: API rate limit is approaching. See data.remaining and data.reset_at for details.
x-enum-descriptions.result.empty: No records found. If filters were applied, data.appliedFilters shows them; otherwise, no records of this type exist yet.
x-enum-descriptions.result.partial_match: Some requested IDs were not found. Check data.missingIds for the list.

AgentHintsArray.description: Array of hints for AI agents. Only present when agentHints=true query parameter is set.

value.description: Amount value in decimal format (e.g., 1234.56 for one thousand two hundred thirty-four dollars and fifty-six cents). Not in cents.

error.description: Error message describing what went wrong

limit.description: Number of items per page (applied limit)

nextOffset.description: Offset for next page (only present if more pages exist)

RateLimitError.description: Returned when rate limit is exceeded. Check `X-RateLimit-Remaining` header before making requests to avoid hitting the limit.

example.error: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.

amount.description: Transaction amount in its original currency (before conversion). May differ from baseAmount for foreign currency transactions.

baseAmount.description: Transaction amount converted to the account's base currency. Use this for calculations and filtering.

category.description: Full category data embedded in response

paymentType.description: Payment method: cash, debit_card, credit_card, transfer (bank transfer), voucher, mobile_payment, web_payment

recordState.description: Transaction state: reconciled (verified against bank statement), cleared (processed by bank), uncleared (pending), void (cancelled/reversed), waitForAssign (awaiting categorization)

recordType.description: Transaction type: income (money received) or expense (money spent)

transferAccountId.description: ID of the account being transferred to/from

transferId.description: ID linking this record to its transfer counterpart

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the photo was created

temporaryUrl.description: Temporary signed URL of the photo (valid for limited time)

UnauthorizedError.description: Returned when authentication fails (invalid/expired token or missing Authorization header)

ValidationError.description: Returned when request validation fails. Common errors: accountId is required, invalid filter format, limit must be between 1 and 100, recordDate range exceeds maximum of 735 days.

BearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from authentication endpoint. The 'sub' claim in the JWT identifies the client_id.

info.description:
REST API for accessing Wallet financial data. Provides endpoints for financial records, accounts, budgets, and other financial entities for the Wallet application.
Query Filter Prefixes
• certain query parameters require inputs with filter prefixes
• Range filters: gt. gte. lt. lte. eq. — comparisons (>, ≥, <, ≤, =)
• Text filters:
    eq. — exact match
    contains. — substring (case-sensitive)
    contains-i. — substring (case-insensitive)
• see the API Reference for more details and examples
info.title: Wallet API

get.description: Returns paginated list of financial accounts

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (1-100, default: 30)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of items to skip (default: 0). Used for pagination.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Enable AI agent hints in response. When true, includes structured hints to help AI agents understand the response and take follow-up actions.
parameters.name: agentHints

parameters.description: Filter by ID. Supports comma-separated list for multiple IDs (max 30).
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Filter by name. Requires text prefix.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter by bank account number. Requires text prefix.
parameters.name: bankAccountNumber

parameters.description: Filter accounts by account type. Case-insensitive.
parameters.name: accountType

parameters.description: Filter by currency code (ISO 4217). Exact match, case-insensitive.
parameters.name: currencyCode

parameters.description: Filter by creation timestamp. Requires range prefix.
parameters.name: createdAt

parameters.description: Filter by last sync timestamp (when entity was last updated in the API database). Requires range prefix.
parameters.name: updatedAt

429.description: Rate limit exceeded. Check `Retry-After` header for when to retry.

500.description: Internal server error. The request was valid but processing failed due to a temporary issue. Retry the request later.

get.description:
▪️Returns REST API usage statistics for the authenticated client.
▪️All successful requests are counted (except this endpoint).
▪️Use period to specify the time range (e.g., 30days, 4weeks) and how it's grouped by a time period (daily, weekly, monthly).
▪️Time ranges of each period use half-open intervals: from is inclusive, to is exclusive.

parameters.description:
Time period for statistics.

**Formats:**
- `Xdays` → daily granularity (max `366days`)
- `Xweeks` → weekly granularity, ISO weeks, Monday start (max `53weeks`)
- `Xmonths` → monthly granularity (max `13months`)
parameters.name: period

429.description: Rate limit exceeded. Check `Retry-After` header for when to retry.

500.description: Internal server error. The request was valid but processing failed due to a temporary issue. Retry the request later.

get.description:
▪️Returns paginated list of financial transaction records.
▪️Requires accountId — query /accounts to obtain IDs
▪️Date range filtering is applied automatically (see recordDate param). The applied date range is returned in recordDateRange response field.

parameters.description: **Required.** Filter by account ID (exact match). Use /accounts to find valid account IDs.
parameters.name: accountId

parameters.description:
Filter by transaction date. Requires range prefix.
Maximal allowed record date range: 370 days.
When bounds incomplete, default intervals apply:
▪️ only gt/gte → 3 months forward
▪️ only lt/lte → 3 months back
▪️ no bounds → last 3 months from now
parameters.name: recordDate

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (1-100, default: 30)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of items to skip (default: 0). Used for pagination.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Enable AI agent hints in response. When true, includes structured hints to help AI agents understand the response and take follow-up actions.
parameters.name: agentHints

parameters.description: Filter by category ID (exact match)
parameters.name: categoryId

parameters.description: Filter by label ID - returns records that have this label
parameters.name: labelId

parameters.description: Filter by note. Requires text prefix.
parameters.name: note

parameters.description: Filter expense records by payee. Requires text prefix.
parameters.name: payee

parameters.description: Filter income records by payer. Requires text prefix.
parameters.name: payer

parameters.description: Filter by transaction amount. Requires range prefix. Applied to baseAmount.value (decimal format, e.g., 100.50).
parameters.name: amount

parameters.description: Filter by creation timestamp. Requires range prefix.
parameters.name: createdAt

parameters.description: Filter by last sync timestamp (when entity was last updated in the API database). Requires range prefix.
parameters.name: updatedAt

parameters.description:
Sort results by field. Prefix with + for ascending, - for descending. Supported fields: recordDate, amount, createdAt, updatedAt.

Examples:
- +recordDate (oldest first)
- -recordDate (newest first)
- +amount (smallest first)
- -amount (largest first)
- -createdAt (most recently created first)
- -updatedAt (most recently synced first)
parameters.name: sortBy

recordDateRange.description: The effective date range filter applied to the query, as array of operator-prefixed timestamps. Example: ["gte.2024-01-01T00:00:00Z", "lt.2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"]

429.description: Rate limit exceeded. Check `Retry-After` header for when to retry.

500.description: Internal server error. The request was valid but processing failed due to a temporary issue. Retry the request later.

get.description: Returns financial transaction records by their unique IDs. Use this endpoint when you already know which records you want to retrieve. Unlike /records, this endpoint does not require a time range filter.

parameters.description: Enable AI agent hints in response. When true, includes structured hints to help AI agents understand the response and take follow-up actions.
parameters.name: agentHints

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of record IDs (max 30)
parameters.name: id

200.description: The records matching the provided IDs (missing IDs are silently skipped)

400.description: Bad request (missing id parameter or too many IDs)

429.description: Rate limit exceeded. Check `Retry-After` header for when to retry.

500.description: Internal server error. The request was valid but processing failed due to a temporary issue. Retry the request later.
